guidelines.title: Be Safe
guidelines.description: Ensuring safety is crucial to maintaining a positive community environment. This includes:

items.details: Do not engage in or promote any illegal activities or harmful behavior that could jeopardize the well-being of our members.
Protect the privacy of fellow community members. Do not share personal or sensitive information without explicit consent.
If you encounter any behavior or content that seems unsafe or concerning, report it promptly to the appropriate moderators or administrators.
Be mindful of your online behavior. Ensure that your interactions contribute to a positive and safe digital environment.

guidelines.title: Be Trustworthy
guidelines.description: Trust is the foundation of our community. To maintain trustworthiness:

items.details: Follow through on promises and commitments you make to the community. Reliability fosters trust and strengthens relationships.
Engage with others in a manner that demonstrates respect and courtesy, even in disagreement. Professionalism is reflected in how you handle conflicts and differences.
Share information that is accurate and verified. Misinformation undermines the community’s trust and efficacy.
Offer help and support to fellow members in a genuine and transparent manner, enhancing the trustworthiness of our collective effort.

guidelines.title: Be Professional
guidelines.description: Professionalism contributes to a respectful and constructive environment. This includes:

items.details: Do not post or share content that is offensive, discriminatory, or unprofessional. Ensure that your contributions are respectful and relevant.
Engage with others in a manner that demonstrates respect and courtesy, even in disagreement. Professionalism is reflected in how you handle conflicts and differences.
Act with honesty and integrity in all interactions. Your actions should reflect the core values of our community and contribute to a positive environment.
Foster discussions that are insightful and constructive. Aim to contribute positively to conversations, promoting growth and learning for all members.

guidelines.title: Respect and Courtesy
guidelines.description: Maintaining a respectful and courteous environment is essential. This involves:

items.details: Engage with others in a polite and respectful manner, even when you disagree with their viewpoints.
Refrain from making negative comments about someone’s character, appearance, or beliefs. Harassment, hate speech, and discriminatory remarks are strictly prohibited.

items.text: Being Mindful of Different Perspectives and Cultures:
items.details: Remember that the community is diverse. Approach conversations with an open mind and consider cultural sensitivities.

guidelines.title: Privacy and Confidentiality
guidelines.description: Respecting privacy and confidentiality is crucial. This includes:

items.details: Do not ask for or share personal information about other members without their explicit permission.

items.text: Not Sharing Personal Information Without Consent:
items.details: Be cautious about sharing personal details like addresses, phone numbers, or private conversations.

items.text: Avoiding Posting Sensitive or Confidential Information:
items.details: Ensure that any information shared is appropriate for a public forum and does not violate privacy or confidentiality agreements.

guidelines.title: No Spamming or Self-Promotion
guidelines.description: To maintain a focused and valuable community, avoid spamming and self-promotion:

items.details: Only post content that is relevant to the community’s interests and purpose.
Do not use the platform for unsolicited advertisements or self-promotion unless it’s clearly relevant and permitted by the community guidelines.
Aim to add meaningful insights and information that benefit the community.

guidelines.title: Intellectual Property
guidelines.description: Respect for intellectual property is essential. This includes:

items.details: Do not share content that you do not have the rights to distribute.
Ensure that any materials you post (articles, images, videos, etc.) are either your own or used with proper permission.
When sharing content created by others, always provide proper attribution and links back to the original source.

guidelines.title: Content Guidelines
guidelines.description: Content guidelines help maintain the quality of discussions. This includes:

items.details: Keep your posts focused on topics that are relevant to the community’s interests.
Ensure that all content shared is suitable for all members and adheres to community standards.
Make your contributions easy to read and understand.

guidelines.title: Conflict Resolution
guidelines.description: Effective conflict resolution is vital for maintaining harmony. This includes:

items.details: Approach disagreements with a goal of finding a positive resolution.

items.text: Using Private Messaging for Personal Conflicts:
items.details: If you have an issue with another member, try to resolve it through private messaging rather than public posts.
If conflicts cannot be resolved between members, seek help from the moderation team.
